location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Captain G Walker, Senior Officer, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Stannus asks Walker to arrange for the despatch to Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi] by any available cruiser of an important letter to Tahnoon bin Shakhboot [Tahnun bin Shakhbut]. The officer commanding the cruiser was then to return direct to Bushire with the reply.
